price: Ulee isaa darbate; isheen yeroma san bofa mul'ataa (guddaa) taate
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
